scripts.test: npm run test:ableron-java && npm run test:ableron-js && npm run test:ableron-express
scripts.test:ableron-js: cd ableron-js && npm ci && npm run build && npm test
scripts.test:ableron-express: cd ableron-js && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../ableron-express && npm install ../ableron-js && npm ci && npm run build && npm test
